have reached the desired size or at least 8 inches see pattern notes for tips on how to size your cardigan for mine at this point it was about 8 inches from center to outer edge you will notice that the shape will not lay perfectly flat but that s okay it s not supposed to take your shape and fold like shown fold your hexagon by putting two adjacent corners together forming an upside down l shape using a stitch marker mark the 2 bottom corners we are leaving this bottom side of the hexagon unworked if using other markers to mark your corners just make these 2 a different color upside down l shape 8 leave this side unworked stitch marker stitch marker end here start here at this point we will be working in row joining with new yarn in one corner
